headline: A Look At Darden Restaurants (DRI) Valuation After Analyst Upgrade And Bahama Breeze Closures
summary: Darden Restaurants (DRI) is back in focus after completing its review of Bahama Breeze, opting to close 14 locations and convert 14 others, while a recent analyst upgrade has already drawn investor attention. See our latest analysis for Darden Restaurants. The share price has recently eased back, with a 1 day share price return of a 0.64% decline and a 7 day share price return of a 2.21% decline from US$211.50. However, a 90 day share price return of 21.67% and a 1 year total shareholder...
